data.name: Almond Cake
data.description:
1.) Bring sugar and water to boil
2.) Squash and cook 5 minutes
3.) Blend almonds with flour and cinnamon.
4.) Combine marzipan and blend.
5.) Mix almonds into the sugar mix.
6.) Mix eggs and then temper and mix over heat briefly.
7.) Add ginger and pour into prepared pan coated with butter and sugar
8.) Bake at 350 for 40 minutes in 9 inch spring form pan

data.name: Bilini
data.description:
1.) Boil potato until cooked with salt, garlic, thyme, and rosemary
2.) Rice potato
3.) Combine all ingredients

Corn Blini, cream fraiche, and superior herring roe

data.name: Brandade
data.description:
1.) Rinse salt cod
2.) Boil salt cod in milk with thyme 
3.) Bake russet potatoes
4.) Rice potatoes with tamis
5.) Drain cooked salt cod and add to bowl with potatoes, lightly break apart fish, you want bigger chucks not a puree
6.) Season with roasted garlic and olive oil

data.name: Caper Raisin Sauce
data.description:
1.) Soak capers to rinse the salt
2.) Boil white wine and pour over raisins
3.) blend capers and raisins together, season with white wine. Add water as needed.

data.name: Chicken Leg Diable
data.description: Braise chicken legs in dark chicken sauce

data.name: Chicken Leg Provencal
data.description:
1.) Add spice mix, salt, dextrose, and thyme to chopped up legs and fat back overnight
2.) Grind seasoned meat

data.name: Chocolate Buttercream
data.description: Whip eggs and sugar, don't make meringue, just thick ribbon

data.name: Chocolate Dentelles
data.description: Toast almond flour then mix with cocoa. Cook the liquids until they reach 220. Stir them occasionally. Then mix the 2 together and roll them between 2 pieces of parchment as thin as you can then freeze. Cut them into squares, cook @ 350 12-15 minutes.

data.name: Corn Bread
data.description:
1.) Mix meal, flour, baking powder, salt
2.) Cream butter and sugar
3.) Add eggs one at a time then milk
4.) Mix dry and wet ingredients
5.) Bake

data.name: Corn Pudding
data.description:
1.) Juice the raw corn. 
2.) Cook with sauted corn in sauce pan till thick
3.) Season with fine herbs and salt

data.name: Diable
data.description:
Ingredients below are from : https://cooking.nytimes.com/recipes/5335-sauce-diable

Peter recipe:
1pt Dijon
1pt Ketchup 
1/4 cp Cognac

data.name: Doughnuts
data.description:
1.) Sugar and shortening creamed
2.) Add eggs 1 at a time
3.) Add buttermilk and cider 
4.) Add Dry

data.name: Duck Proscuitto
data.description:
1.) Mix all ingredients except duck
2.) Pack duck in salt/sugar mix for 1 week
3.) Rinse duck with water 
4.) Wrap duck in cheese cloth and hang in cooler for 1 week

data.name: Gateau Bourbonnaise
data.description:
Baked Pancake
1.) Boil milk, butter, vanilla. Steep for 10 minutes
2.) Cream egg yolk and sugar
3.) Add flour
4.) Whip whites to soft peak with salt and lemon juice
5.) Fold together
6.) Heat a thin cast iron pan, brown a couple tabs of butter
7.) Add pancake mix, optionally add fruit
8.) Bake for 10-15 minutes in 400 degree oven

data.name: Gougeres
data.description:
1.) Boil water, salt, thyme, pepper
2.) Add flour all at once
3.) Stir till smooth ball
4.) Add egg
5.) Add cheese
6.) Pipe cherry tomato size balls, sprinkle with cheese
7.) Bake at 425 for 10 minutes, turn down to 375 for 10 minutes

data.name: Ham
data.description:
1.) Brine ham for 1 week.
    NOTE: Use 50% of water to boil the ingredients, pour over ice to make 1 gallon.
2.) Dry in cooler for 1 week.
3.) smoke at 250 degrees for approximately 5-6 hours until internal temp reaches 145 degrees.

data.name: Hollandaise
data.description:
1.) Start a pot of water on the stove.
2.) Add egg yolks + 1 tsp of lemon juice to a bowl. 
3.) Whisk egg yolks over double boiler until they become lightly cooked and silky smooth. 
4.) Slowly put in cold cubes of whole butter and whisk over the double boiler to make an emulsion.
5.) Season with cayenne, salt, and lemon juice to taste
6.) Store in a warm environment in two containers with a lid.

data.name: Kibbeh
data.description:
1.) Roast squash
2.) Small dice and saute mirepox
3.) Cook bulgur wheat in water with salt and garlic
4.) Combine all ingredients and season with salt
5.) Chill
6.) Bread patties with egg white wash, breadcrumb, and crushed coriander

Note: squash can be substituted for other vegetables like 1000g parsnip

data.name: Lamb Tartare
data.description:
1.) Cut lamb to tacky then let chill 20-30 minutes
2.) Bloom Bulgur 10 minutes
3.) Combine shallots, spices, paste and lemon juice
4.) Stir olive oil and herbs into the meat
5.) Mix with paddle 2-3 minutes or by hand 5 minutes until creamy
6.) Garnish with tomato concasse

data.name: Lentils
data.description:
1.) Cook with mirepox, remove mirepox once cooked
2.) Season with dijon, sherry vinegar, and salt
3.) Dice and saute mirepox to add to cooked lentils

data.name: Mushroom A La Gracque
data.description:
1.) Blanche mushrooms in salt water
2.) Drain
3.) Toast spices
4.) Simmer all but mushrooms for 30 minutes
5.) Pour over mushrooms
6.) Refrigerate

data.name: Mushroom torte
data.description:
Potatoes
1.) Bake the potato until cooked. 2.) scoop into bowl. 3.) Add butter, salt, and white pepper to season. 4.) Smash into big pieces, do not make mashed potatoes.

1.) Line a mini pie tin with potato about 1/2 of the way up.
2.) Add mushrooms, add chevre, add fine herbs, roll out and cover pie tin with pie crust.
4.) Bake till done

data.name: Mussel Jus
data.description: Finish with radish top/ramp top/watercress blended into sauce

data.name: Orange Date Muffin
data.description:
1.) Robo coup (butter, dates, orange peal) to pea size butter. 
2.) Combine eggs & sugar
3.) Add date mix
4.) Combine dry, fold in wet
5.) Sugar the tops
6.) Bake at 400 degrees in deck oven 30-40 minutes

data.name: Pancake
data.description:
Wet
- Butter
- Eggs
- Buttermilk
- Whole milk

Dry
- AP Flour
- Sugar
- Baking powder
- Baking soda
- Salt

data.name: Panisse
data.description:
1.) Add Milk, chickpea flour, and butter to large pan
2.) Stir constantly on medium heat until mixture becomes thick.
3.) Remove from heat and add EVO, fennel seed, and black pepper
4.) Season with salt
5.) Pour into sheet tray with parchment paper on it, flatten and smooth mixture
6.) Place in cooler
7.) Once cool, cut into fry shape
8.) Toss in cornmeal and deep fry till golden brown

data.name: Pasta Dough
data.description: Directions for mixing dough: https://www.epicurious.com/recipes/food/views/pasta-dough-for-agnolotti-105858

data.name: Pastrami
data.description:
1.)Brine pastrami for 1 week.
    NOTE: Use 50% of water to boil the ingredients, pour over ice to make 1 gallon.
2.) dry in cooler for 1 week
3.) smoke at 250 degrees for approximately 5-6 hours until internal temp reaches 185 degrees for 1 hour.

data.name: Pate Brisse
data.description:
1.) Mix butter, salt, flour to pebbles
2.) Add the liquid all at the same time
3.) Do not overmix

data.name: Pickling Spice
data.description: Used for brines like pastrami or cucumber pickles. Toast all spices in a dry saute pan and cool. Store in a airtight container away from light.

data.name: Pita Bread
data.description:
Ghee to coat, standard dough method, soft flour
450 degrees 10 minutes

data.name: Poached Apples
data.description:
1.) Make poaching liquid, cool
2.) Add apple to bag with liquid
3.) Sous vide 185 for 30 minutes

data.name: Pretzel Bread
data.description:
1.) Mix ingredients, improved mixed method (Raymond Calvel)
2.) 1st proof
3.) Shape into long snakes
4.) Boil dough in baking soda water
5.) Cut dough into preferred shape
6.) Egg wash and sprinkle with coarse salt
7.) Bake

data.name: Provencal Spice Mix
data.description:
1.) Toast spices
2.) Grind cooled spices
3.) Mince garlic and ginger
4.) Combine all ingredients

data.name: Prune Relish
data.description:
1.) Steep tea
2.) Pour over prunes,
3.) Strain and reserve liquid
4.) Soak capers
5.) Chop olives, capers, prunes
6.) Chop thyme and mix with marinated prunes

data.name: Rye Bread
data.description:
Preferment
- 800g Mother
- 512g Rye flour
- 460g H2O
- 1360g Onion
- 115g Butter

Saute onions in butter, cool and add to preferment mix

data.name: Salt Cod
data.description:
1.) Salt cod
2.) Place cod in pan with area for water to drain at the bottom
3.) Wrap container tightly
4.) Wait 5-9 days

ingredients.name: Mustard Seed soaked in Apple Cider Vinegar

data.name: Spinach Cream
data.description:
1.) Reduce cream with nutmeg, garlic, thyme, and rosemary by half
2.) Blend with blanched spinach

data.name: Tomato Compote
data.description:
1.) Concasse tomatoes
2.) Saute onion till soft then add garlic and saute till soft
3.) Add tomatoes and bouquet 
4.) Stew mixture until thick consistency
5.) Season with salt and sugar

data.name: Waffle
data.description:
1.) Mix dry with yeast
2.) Whisk warm milk, melt butter
3.) Whisk together
4.) Cool in fridge overnight

data.name: Walnut Nougatine
data.description: Make caramel, add toasted nuts
